title: AI To Track Icebergs Adrift At Sea In Boon For Science
summary_full: British scientists said that a world-first AI tool to catalogue and track icebergs as they break apart into smaller chunks could fill a "major blind spot" in predicting climate change.
summary_public: British scientists said that a world-first AI tool to catalogue and track icebergs as they break apart into smaller chunks could fill a "major blind spot" in predicting climate change.
